mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transactions (account_id, direction, amount, currency_code, description, balance_after) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{direction}, #{amount}, #{currencyCode}, #{description}, #{balanceAfter})
mapper.select: SELECT id, account_id, direction, amount, currency_code, description, balance_after, created_at FROM transactions WHERE account_id = #{accountId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, account_id, direction, amount, currency_code, description, balance_after, created_at FROM transactions WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND currency_code = #{currencyCode} ORDER BY created_at DESC
